headline: Axon (NASDAQ:AXON) Reports Upbeat Q2, Full-Year Outlook Slightly Exceeds Expectations
summary: Self defense company AXON (NASDAQ:AXON) reported Q2 CY2025 results topping the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 32.8% year on year to $668.5 million. The company’s full-year revenue guidance of $2.69 billion at the midpoint came in 1.2% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.12 per share was 45% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Axon raises annual revenue forecast on strong security demand
summary: TASER maker Axon Enterprise raised its full-year revenue forecast on Monday, betting on continued demand for its software products and security devices. Shares of Axon were up 3.5% in aftermarket trading. The Arizona-based company — known for its law enforcement technology, including TASER energy weapons, body-worn cameras, and digital evidence management systems — has benefited from rising corporate spending on executive security and increased federal investment in immigration enforcement.

headline: Axon Enterprise (AXON) Tops Q2 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Axon (AXON) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +37.66% and +3.98%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Axon: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The results exceeded Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of six analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $1.54 per share. The maker of stun guns and body cameras posted revenue of $668.5 million in the period, which also topped Street forecasts.
